Welcome to Learn to Write 101
====================================

How does one start writing
==========================

The way to write is very simple. However people tend to find writing very difficult and thats because
writing helps to build an open flow of the person's thoughts. Most people are worried about this and this makes them really worried.
But, Don't worry!!. We'll learn everything in these documentations.

^^^^^
